msg:
Broke up UI into two phases
Support multiple documents with their own state
Fixed cancel and made it exception based

Added upscale which does not tile the image but used tiled VAE extension
Fixed image bounds clamp at borders
Fixed multi document sharing image collection
Improved error handling

Comfy: added settings for checkpoint and sampler
Also improved error handling
Comfy: fix batch size not working for inpaint
Fixed style when opening settings / switching document
Fixed external server mode
Handle server errors reported via websocket
Don't pass mask to IP adapter for now (sometimes causes errors)

Fixed issue when there are error/cancelled jobs
Don't merge history if bounds mismatch
Fixes for linux and some additional progress reporting
Fixed checkpoints not updating after connecting
Fixed settings when there are no open documents
Fixed some more multiple-of-8 issues

Improved inpainting masks, area and upsacling:
* Mask grow and feather now depends on mask size, not image size
* Image is now padded with additional context, instead of using the entire image
* Read only relevant image region from Krita, instead of reading all and crop afterwards
* For larger upscaling factors (>1.5x) use upscaling model
* -> Upscaling model NKMD Superscale now required download
* -> Fixes block artifacts and results in sharper images
* Fixed connection settings not being updated
* Fixed connection error when nodes are missing
* Improved performance of mask -> image conversion

Added icons for control modes
Better error handling when optional control-net isn't found

Pass creationflags to windows process to avoid console windows from popping up
Fixed cpu mode not being initialized on restart

Use Python venv on Linux #2
* venv required on eg. Debian which does not allow installing into system python
* venv also just generally a good idea to avoid conflicts
* better error message if python/pip cannot be found
Improved error for missing clip vision #1

Fixed some locale / encoding issues #5
- start ComfyUI in utf8 mode to to get utf8 output on process pipes
- use default locale for installation process output
- fixed pip hang when it produces gigantic error message (pipe block)
Added setting for random seed (for debug purpose)

Fixed #11
'QNetworkReply' has no attribute 'HttpStatusCodeAttribute'
Docker: use venv, extra_model_paths, various fixes

Switch to IPAdapter_plus extension
* Supports CPU & DirectML, fix #16

Improved handling of sporadic websocket disconnect
* Fixed error message when websocket is closed by server
* Use websockets built-in reconnect behavior
* Fixed reconnect not working after losing connection
Try to fix xformers install issue #17
Fixed tests

Added image reference as new control mode
uses clip-vision/ip-adapter to influence images

Fixed history not being restored when switching image tabs
Fix platform check #13
Fixed upscaling to non-multiple-8 resolutions
Fixed initial install & use of upscaler

Fixed creating/deleting styles
- asserted if upscale widget had never been used
Fixed download errors being silently ignored

Apply image crop for inpaint to selection area

Area conditioning bounds were incorrect for small areas that received a sub-region of the image as context.
Likely cause for #36

Also add minimum size (64) for areas since smaller values trigger a validation error
Fixed server UI status updates
Fixed initial workload selection if only XL is installed
Set fixed versions for server packages
Fixed change style in upscale UI having no effect
Fixed control layer not respecting style change

Scale live preview display
Copy live results as layer to image
Fix toggle action to include live workspace

Icons for live mode
Fixed error handling
Fix welcome messages, initial style
Fix typo in extra_model_paths for docker
Detect safetensors version of clip vision model (fix #54)
Fix preview toggle & apply #52

Fix issue with text disappearing in 1-line widget #59
can't seem to disable scroll in text edit, so replacing with line edit
Fix plugin version / server version mixup #65
Fix issue with long paths on windows #87
Fix not being able to install missing nodes

Make install detection and actual install consistent #80
- Report an error directly when trying to install something but the target folder is already there and not empty (previously would ignore and move on)
Add error message and troubleshooting section for common issue
corrects the link to directly point to the download source
fix: resolve bug with icon color not adapting to themes

Refactor/fix some issues with prompt text boxes
- use same widgets for generate & live
- abstract away the switch between QLineEdit and QPlaintTextEdit
- fixed negative prompt not updated in the UI when switching documents
- show negative prompt box in live mode if enabled in settings #98
Fix broken inpaint/outpaint when it involves upscale #121
Fix scenario where server needs an upgrade AND a new required model

Performance upgrade by using KSamplerAdvanced with fewer steps

Setting for advanced KSampler use

ksampler_advanced method, denoise calculations

Use ksampler_advanced when relevant

Don't use sampler_steps_upscaling with use_advanced_sampler

Don't use advanced sampler method for live mode

Removed unnecessary checkbox

New parameter min_steps for ksampler_advanced

Ensures live mode always uses the predefined steps number even with ksampler_advanced

Using math.floor when rounding start_at_step according to min_steps

Corrected a double argument in inpaint ksampler_advanced call

Remove use_advanced_sampler setting, ksampler_advanced is now used by default

Add the correct steps number to sample_count

Moved the start_at_step calculation to _apply_strength method. min_steps replaced by fixed_steps parameter

Refactor, moved _apply_strength call inside _sampler_params method

Replaced fixed_steps parameter by min_steps in _apply_strength . Set min_step to '1' in normal rendering, and to 'steps' in live mode.

Removed unwanted start_at_step param key when _sampler_params is called by the upscaler

Removed entirely sampler_steps_upscaling style parameter

_sampler_params method parameters update : set default 'strength' to 1.0, replaced 'upscale' by 'advanced'

Removed 'is_upscaling' parameter from get_sampler_config method

Corrected _sampler_params 'advanced' param behaviour

Reorganize files and imports:
Split up model.py
Split up widget.py
Clean up module imports
Use explicit signals (bit more boilerplate, but auto-completion and type check support)

* Prevent result initialization to overwrite {prompt} token
* Merge region positive prompts with root positive prompt in the regions to_api
* No more prompt merging in apply_attention. Removed unnecessary negative prompts clip encoding
* Using ETN_AttentionCouple and ETN_ListAppend nodes to apply attention couple
* Initialize accumulated_mask with the first valid region mask

Brazilian Portuguese Translation (#988)

* Spanish translation

Some key words were not fully translated because they are commonly used and recognizable by people who have at least minimal exposure to terms related to artificial intelligence and stable diffusion, like 'steps', CFG, etc.

The term ‘Prompt’ remains unchanged because it is widely used in various contexts, and practically everyone is accustomed to hearing it. Additionally, there is no official translation for it. However, this may be subject to change if necessary."

* fix version confusion

* simplify `copy_scripts`

Fix infinite recursion when loading a document
- canvasChanged
-> root.create_model
-> ModelSync.load
-> RecentSync.setter
-> settings.changed
-> CustomWorkflow.update_workflow
-> root.active_document
-> root.create_model
-> [LOOP]

There are many places to break the loop, fixing 3 of them hopefully also avoids similar loop in the future:
- add model to collection after creating it BEFORE loading the document, so model_for_active_document hits the already existing model
- don't emit settings change when updating recent (it's not directly set by user)
- don't update whole custom graph UI when settings change.
-- might break something?
